amendment.description: Amendment sought to allocate funds to create an Office of Good Jobs in DOE.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funds within the Office of the Inspector General.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 245 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 245 (Roll no. 252).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
